name: Hasty Heroes
description:
Hasty heroes is a simple 2D endless jumping game. Choose from one of 5 avatars, and from 3 unique environments. 

INSTRUCTIONS

It's really easy to play! Use the arrow keys to move left or right, and use the Up key to jump. The game's over when you get hit by a spikeball, or fall bellow the screen.

If the game doesn't start after clicking the avatar, just refresh the page. I will try to fix this bug as soon as I can

CREDITS

The game assets including the background and the tiles were made by  Kenny, the character sprites were made by MadFireOn, and the idea for the game was inspired  by a tutorial from joshmorony.
